mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test.board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{regId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE test.board SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, VIEWS=#{views}, MOD_ID=#{modId}, MOD_DT=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq};
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEWS, REG_ID, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT FROM test.board WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
